overview: "Shells bursting around her as she races through the WWI trenches, then she sees him! Driven by her burning desire to have his baby before it's too late..."  Willie (Randy West) and Ann (Jacqueline Lorians) have created a beautiful romantic scene, their best as screen writers, until starlet Gina Valentino says, "rewrite this or I walk." The scene is perfect but who is the starlet currently sleeping with...the producer..."REWRITE!!! 24 hours or you're fired!"  Could Sara be French film star Nichole West or British spy Josephine Carrington? American diplomatic courier Andrea Brittian, or a lady of pleasure Gail Force made to leave Paris by the war? Ann and Willie will make the love scene work, but will they find meaning in their own relationship?  The Love Scene is intrigue, beauty, sensuality andâ€¦romance.
title: The Love Scene
